{"step_by_step_thinking": "The relevant documents mention hormone analysis for diagnosing pregnancy. Specifically, the document 'Hormone analyses and ultrasound examinations in high-risk early weeks of pregnancy (author's transl)' states that HCG determination possessed the advantage of being reliably measurable even before cessation of menstrual bleeding. This suggests that hCG levels can be used to establish a diagnosis of pregnancy safely and early.", "answer_choice": "C"}
